author: Home Repair Tutor
description: Shower valve waterproofing tips…a big mistake folks make is not waterproofing the shower valve. Kids splashing in tubs or improper tile work around the valve can lead to moldy walls. This costs $10 and is well worth the 5 minutes. If you’re remodeling a shower and want a beautiful end result join our Video Library at homerepairtutor.com 👍🏽🔥#showerremodel #schlutersystems #homerepairtutor
title: Shower Valve Waterproofing Tips - #shorts #homerepairtutor
